website_summaries.verdict: A terrific car wash kit that enables you to keep your car looking shiny and new.
pros: Includes 9 auto cleaning tools that are made from fine materials and are designed to be soft, sturdy and durable
Kit's tools are specially-designed for easy use
More affordable than many comparable kits
cons: Kit's wheel brush is poorly constructed and may break after limited use

customer_reviews.title: nice collection of car wash tools
customer_reviews.text: The tool box includes everything needed for car wash. They come in a nice and compact box as shown in attached picture. I washed my car last weekend. It turns out I only used the sponge and the microfiber towel. They work very well. One attached picture shows my car after shampoo and the other one shows the finished look. I would say the towels feel soft and good quality. Have not try plastic parts yet. Anyway, I am very satisfied with the car wash kit.
customer_reviews.author: W. Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give my car a little more love so I bought this little kit. I love this kit it comes with every thing you need to spruce up your car externally. With brushes, rags, and a squeegee. This kit is the best Bang For Buck. Totally recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jbooming

customer_reviews.title: The duster head is a little flimsy and fluff breaks ...
customer_reviews.text: The duster head is a little flimsy and fluff breaks off from it but the rest is decent quality for the price you're paying. No issues with the rest, and use it weekly to clean my car.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrenne

customer_reviews.title: Car washing kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car washing kit because I wanted a complete set. This kit has everything I need except washing detergent. This kit does not include car washing detergent so you need to buy your own. The towels are soft and I was able to clean my car with this kit
customer_reviews.author: Peter T.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a really convenient car cleaning kit. It is really nice having everything in one place with a nice storage box to keep it organized in-between uses. It is a good selection of towels and brushes, and I really like that it comes with a squeegee to help with keeping the windows clean after a good wash.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen E.

customer_reviews.title: Car washing kit
customer_reviews.text: Pretty handful car washing tool kit, it includes all kinds of tools u might need for washing ur car. Also, everything is included in a tool box which u can carry it in an integral part.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: This wash mitt does a great job of getting the dirt and grime off my ...
customer_reviews.text: This wash mitt does a great job of getting the dirt and grime off my car. It is a very high-quality product with good customer support if needed. Thank you guys.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This thing was awesome, and I still use it. I was disappointed in the tire brush. Literally broke first use. I didn't do it hard or anything
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Decent for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This set is nice to have for car washing and it makes things easier because you don't have to pick it a hodge podge of products. You already know the pieces will work well together (and you don't forget anything!)
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Mackey

customer_reviews.title: the quality looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and only saw him open it. From what I saw without using it, the quality looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Bucketlist mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Great for any car detailing needs
customer_reviews.text: Comes with pretty much everything you need to clean and dry your car, overall good quality items and it was a pretty good price too. Bonus for the case that carries everything!
customer_reviews.author: Armir

customer_reviews.title: All the items in this kit work great. My car looks brand new
customer_reviews.text: All the items in this kit work great. My car looks brand new! And all fits in storage box to keep it all together.
customer_reviews.author: Janis C. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: It is great, I use it to wash my car, it works perfectly for me. It is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Yuhang

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to put all the cleaning stuff back in the carrying case that it comes with
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I love to clean my car and these tools are the best
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Products
customer_reviews.text: There’s quite a bit offered for a very low price, but the quality of everything is subpar. The towels are not soft, I would never allow the brush to touch anything on my car as it’s far too course, the squeegee is fine but inefficient due to it’s size. The best item is the carrying case, it’s sturdy and sizeable for a few quick detailing or cleaning items you may keep around to keep your baby shining. Other than the carrying case, I really have no use for anything else that came with it. I suppose I’ll just use the towels around the house.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality Kit
customer_reviews.text: Low quality products. The wheel brush broke the first time I used and I couldn't even finish cleaning the first wheel! Window duster stick gets loose all the time. for the same price I think it's better to buy better quality pieces separately.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: useful group
customer_reviews.text: while not the highest quality, this did include all you need to clean your car. This was gift to a friend who never washes his car despite the fact that it is almost brand new.
customer_reviews.author: steve

product_meta.title: Mofeez 9pcs Car Cleaning Tools Kit with Blow Box Car Tire Brush Wash Mitt Sponge Wax Applicator Microfiber Cloths Window Water Blade Brush
feature_bullets: PERFECT VEHICLE WASH KIT 9 PACK: including 1 car duster, 1 Microfiber car wash sponge,3 car wash microfiber cloths (gray for water stains cleaning, brown for window and car body), 1 car tire brush,1 car wheel brush with handle and 1 window water scraper inside 1 plastic blow storage box, saving room for your car or house.

WON'T SCRATCH YOUR VEHICLES: the auto cleaning tools are made from fine material to be soft, sturdy and durable, that will not damage your precious cars. Microfiber material will not leave link or fragment after cleaning.

KEEP CAR SHINY: The tools are specially designed for easy use, convenient for you to hold and clean your car thoroughly, for almost all auto parts, car surface, air vent, leather car seat, windshield, hood, doors, windows, wheels and ect.. Keeping your car, truck, auto, van and motorcycle clean and shiny all the time!
COMPLETE TOOL KIT: Blow Box size: 38*22*18cm/15*8.66*7.08*inch.
